adaptable.title: Adaptable & Efficient
adaptable.description: A proactive and resourceful individual who excels in independent environments, consistently delivering high-quality work with a keen eye for detail.

supportive.title: Supportive & Inclusive
supportive.description: A friendly and effective collaborator who thrives in any team environment, driving projects forward with seamless communication and a results-oriented approach.

experience.title: Experience & Responsibility
experience.description: Experience, quality, commitment, and responsibility. That's what you'll find in me, in addition to being a friendly person who easily adapts to work environments in a friendly and efficient manner.

individual.title: Individual Skills
individual.items:
• I'm a proactive and responsible person with a great capacity for learning and adaptation.
  • I'm passionate about technology and I enjoy solving problems creatively.
  • I'm organized and methodical in my work, and I always strive for excellence in every project.
  • I like to stay up-to-date on the latest trends in web development.
  • I have an ease for working independently and meeting deadlines.

teamwork.title: Teamwork Skills
teamwork.items:
• I'm an excellent communicator and I love collaborating with others to achieve common goals.
  • I enjoy working in a team and learning from the experiences of others. I'm flexible and I adapt easily to different roles and work environments.
  • I like to share my knowledge and help others grow.
  • I believe in the importance of a good work environment and open communication.

about.description:
I am a versatile Full Stack Developer with strong experience in both frontend and backend development. My expertise includes JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, Node.js, Python, Odoo ERP, and database management with SQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I focus on delivering high-quality, tailored solutions that combine functionality, scalability, and a great user experience.

Beyond my technical skills, I bring adaptability, problem-solving, and a proactive mindset to every project. I enjoy working in collaborative environments as well as independently, always maintaining responsibility, attention to detail, and a results-oriented approach. My goal is to contribute to projects where technology drives growth, efficiency, and innovation.
